actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a one-time exclusion of gain from the sale of a principal residence by a taxpayer who engages in such sale because he or a member of his family has become disabled, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend the one-time exclusion of gain from the sale of a principal residence for persons aged 55 or over to a taxpayer who sells because the taxpayer or a member of the taxpayer's family has become disabled.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a one-time exclusion of gain from the sale of a principal residence by a taxpayer who engages in such sale because he or a member of his family has become disabled, and for other purposes.
